```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("ggpubr")
library(lubridate)

```

```{r}
dat<-read.csv("Lake_Powel_Inflow_Elevation_Outflow_Evap.csv")
dat$netflows <- dat$total.inflows - dat$total.release
# tdat<-tail(dat, n=10)
print(dat)

# tdat$newdate <- strptime(as.character(tdat$datetime), "%d/%m/%Y")

dat2<-aggregate(dat[, 9], list(dat$Year), sum)
print(dat2)
dat<-aggregate(dat[, 2:4], list(dat$Year), mean)

dat<-dat[dat$Group.1 > 1980, ]

print(dat)
```


```{r}


ggscatter(dat, x = "total.inflows", y = "total.release",
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "total inflows", ylab = "total release")

res1 <- cor.test(dat$total.inflows, dat$total.release, 
                    method = "pearson")
res1


ggscatter(dat, x = "pool.elevation", y = "total.inflows",
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "pool elevation", ylab = "total.inflows")

res2 <- cor.test(dat$pool.elevation, dat$total.inflows, 
                    method = "pearson")
res2

ggscatter(dat, x = "Group.1", y = "total.inflows",
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "Year", ylab = "total.inflows")

res3 <- cor.test(dat$Group.1, dat$total.inflows, 
                    method = "pearson")
res3

ggscatter(dat, x = "Group.1", y = "total.release",
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "Year", ylab = "total.release")

res4 <- cor.test(dat$Group.1, dat$total.release, 
                    method = "pearson")
res4

##todo year vs elevation
ggscatter(dat, x = "Group.1", y = "pool.elevation",
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "Year", ylab = "pool.elevation")

res5 <- cor.test(dat$Group.1, dat$pool.elevation, 
                    method = "pearson")
res5

##todo year vs elevation
ggscatter(dat2, x = "Group.1", y = "x",
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "Year", ylab = "netflow")

res5 <- cor.test(dat2$Group.1, dat2$x, 
                    method = "pearson")
res5




```
```{r}
ggscatter(dat, x = "Group.1", y = "total.release",
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "Year", ylab = "total.release")

res4 <- cor.test(dat$Group.1, dat$total.release, 
                    method = "pearson")
res4
```
